data.chText: 这次危机对贸易产生了很坏的影响。
data.enText: The crisis had a negative effect on trade.

data.chText: 整个经历当然是利多于弊。
data.enText: The whole experience was definitely more positive than negative.

data.chText: 消极的；负面的；缺乏热情的
data.enText: considering only the bad side of sth/sb; lacking enthusiasm or hope

data.chText: 科学家对这个理论的态度是相当消极的。
data.enText: Scientists have a fairly negative attitude to the theory.

data.chText: “他很可能不会露面。”“别那么泄气嘛。”
data.enText: ‘He probably won't show up.’ ‘Don't be so negative.’

data.chText: 他们得到一个否定的答复。

data.enText: containing a word such as ‘no’, ‘not’, ‘never’, etc.

data.chText: 结果为阴性的（或否定的）
data.enText: not showing any evidence of a particular substance or medical condition
containing or producing the type of electricity that is carried by an electron
the negative terminal of a battery
a word or statement that means ‘no’; a refusal or denial
She answered in the negative (= said ‘no’) .
a developed film showing the dark areas of an actual scene as light and the light areas as dark
the result of a test or an experiment that shows that a substance or condition is not present

data.chText: 癌症检查的结果中，假阴性占一定比例的现象受到极大关注。
data.enText: The percentage of false negatives generated by the cancer test is of great concern.
to refuse to agree to a proposal or a request
to prove that sth is not true

simple_means.memory_skill: neg 否认，拒绝 + ative 有…倾向（性质）的 → 否认的

means: 结果为阴性的（或否定的）

tr: a piece of photographic film showing an image with light and shade or colors reversed
expressing or consisting of a negation or refusal or denial
designed or tending to discredit, especially without positive or helpful suggestions
having the quality of something harmful or unpleasant
example: delinquents retarded by their negative outlook on life

tr: characterized by or displaying negation or denial or opposition or resistance
example: a negative reaction to an advertising campaign

tr: reckoned in a direction opposite to that regarded as positive
not indicating the presence of microorganisms or disease or a specific condition

value.def: A fact, situation, or experience that is negative is unpleasant, depressing, or harmful.

example.ex: The news from overseas is overwhelmingly negative...
example.tran: 来自海外的消息特别不容乐观。

example.ex: All this had an extremely negative effect on the criminal justice system.
example.tran: 这一切对刑事司法制度产生了极坏的影响。

value.tran: (事实、局势或经历)不悦的，沮丧的，有害的

example.ex: This will negatively affect the result over the first half of the year.
example.tran: 这将对上半年的结果产生不利影响。

value.def: If someone is negative or has a negative attitude, they consider only the bad aspects of a situation, rather than the good ones.

example.ex: When asked for your views about your current job, on no account must you be negative about it...
example.tran: 被问及你对自己目前工作的看法时，无论如何不要流露出消极情绪。

example.ex: Why does the media present such a negative view of this splendid city?
example.tran: 媒体为什么对这座光彩夺目的城市持如此悲观的看法？

example.ex: A few weeks later he said that maybe he viewed all his relationships rather negatively.
example.tran: 几个星期后，他说他也许把自己的各种人际关系看得太消极了。

example.ex: I loathe negativity. I can't stand people who moan.
example.tran: 我厌恶消极态度，不能忍受唉声叹气的人。

value.def: A negative reply or decision indicates the answer 'no'.

example.ex: Dr Velayati gave a vague but negative response...
example.tran: 韦拉亚提医生给了一个含糊而否定的回答。

example.ex: Upon a negative decision, the applicant loses the protection offered by Belgian law...
example.tran: 一旦得到否定裁决，申请人就失去了比利时法律的保护。

example.ex: The Tory response to that was negative.
example.tran: 保守党对此的答复是否定的。

value.tran: (回答或决定)否定的，表示否认的

example.ex: 60 percent of the sample answered negatively...
example.tran: 抽样调查中60％的接受调查者作出了否定回答。

example.ex: Stein shook his head slowly, negatively.
example.tran: 斯坦慢慢摇了摇头，表示否定。

value.def: A negative is a word, expression, or gesture that means 'no' or 'not'.

example.ex: In the past we have heard only negatives when it came to following a healthy diet.
example.tran: 说到遵循健康饮食习惯，我们过去听到的都是否定的说法。

value.tran: 否定词;否定语;否定表示

value.def: In grammar, a negative clause contains a word such as 'not', 'never', or 'no-one'.
If a medical test or scientific test is negative, it shows no evidence of the medical condition or substance that you are looking for.

example.ex: So far 57 have taken the test and all have been negative.
example.tran: 到目前为止，参加测试的有57人，测试结果均呈阴性。

example.ex: ...negative test results.
example.tran: 阴性测试结果

value.tran: (医学检查或科学试验)呈阴性的，结果为否定的

value.def: In photography, a negative is an image that shows dark areas as light and light areas as dark. Negatives are made from a camera film, and are used to print photographs.
A negative charge or current has the same electrical charge as an electron.

example.ex: Stimulate the site of greatest pain with a small negative current.
example.tran: 以微弱负电流刺激疼得最厉害的部位。

example.ex: As these electrons are negatively charged they will attempt to repel each other.
example.tran: 因为这些电子都带负电，它们将会互相排斥。

value.def: A negative number, quantity, or measurement is less than zero.

example.ex: The weakest students can end up with a negative score.
example.tran: 最差的学生可能会以负分收场。

value.def: If an answer is in the negative, it is 'no' or means 'no'.

example.ex: The Council answered those questions in the negative...
example.tran: 委员会对那些问题的答复是否定的。

example.ex: Seventy-nine voted in the affirmative, and none in the negative.
example.tran: 79人投赞成票，没有人投反对票。

value.def: If a sentence is in the negative, it contains a word such as 'not', 'never', or 'no-one'.

example.ex: 'I went' in the negative is 'I did not go'.
example.tran: I went (我去了)的否定式是 I did not go (我没去)。

trans: 正反；正负；正反面；身份证正反面；正面与负面
(指回答)否定的，否定地；否定句的;否定式的
负反馈，负反应；缩写为NF, NFB
负向迁移；语言负迁移；负迁移；母语负迁移；负迁移作用
逆评价因素；否定评价因素
革兰氏阴性细菌；革兰氏阴性；革兰氏阴性菌；革兰阴性杆菌；格兰氏阴性

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to deny 否认, 拒绝
rootsaffixes.title: neg

partsOfSpeech.dec: ab 加强 + neg 否认，拒绝 + ate 做，造成，使… → 否认；拒绝
neg 否认，拒绝 + ate 做，造成，使… → 否认；取消
neg 否认，拒绝 + ative 有…倾向（性质）的，属于…的 → 否认的
neg 否认，拒绝 + lect 选择 → 拒绝选择 → 忽视
neg 否认，拒绝 + lig 捆绑 + ence 表行为 →〔心〕没有绑在工作上 → 玩忽职守
neg 否认，拒绝 + lig 选择 + ible 可…的 → 不用选择的 → 可以忽视的
re 反 + neg 否认，拒绝 + e → 翻脸不认人 → 背信弃义
re 反 + neg 否认，拒绝 + ade 表人 → 背叛者
